mapper.select: select w.wishListCode, w.bookNo, w.id, b.bookTitle, b.imagePath, bs.bookCode, bs.rentStatus, bs.reserveStatus from wishlist w inner join bookStatus bs on w.bookNo=bs.bookNo inner join book b on bs.bookCode=b.bookCode where w.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into reserve (id, reserveDate, bookNo) values ( #{id} , curDate() , #{bookNo} )
mapper.update: update bookstatus set reserveStatus=1 where bookNo=#{bookNo}
mapper.insert: insert into renthistory (bookNo, rentDate, id) values (#{bookNo}, curdate(), #{id});
mapper.update: update bookstatus set rentStatus=0, returnDueDate=date_add(curdate(),interval+7 day), reserveStatus=0 where bookNo=#{bookNo};
